channel.title: CVE Feed for QNAP Systems Inc. -- Kazoo Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for QNAP Systems Inc. -- Kazoo Server

item.title: CVE-2021-38679|2024-09-16T17:28:42.210Z -- qnap%20systems%20inc. -- kazoo%20server
item.description: An improper authentication vulnerability has been reported to affect QNAP NAS running Kazoo Server. If exploited, this vulnerability allows attackers to compromise the security of the system. We have already fixed this vulnerability in the following versions of Kazoo Server: Kazoo Server 4.11.22 and later
